Posts.EditableText: Hey!! Question!! Whats the point? These games are dead. You're just beating their corpse. Beating it with a lead pipe called QDK. The good ol' DOS IF's were GREAT, but then you came out with a user friendly, happy go luckly program that made it so easy to make crappy games such as Forgotten and others. Its just stupid. Stupid stupid stupid. For christ sakes! Just let them die already!! You're ruining a good thing! Damn your soul, Alex. Damn your soul.
